Container.Name: OctoApp-Plugin
Container.Overview:
A plugin providing extra functionality to OctoApp.
To use this plugin: 1) Get the required information for your 3D printer. 2) Install the Docker plugin in UnRaid using the information. 3) View the Docker container logs to verify the connection. 4) Make a new Docker container plugin for all your 3D printers!
To follow this link for a guide on how to get the required Docker variables for your 3D printer: https://octoeverywhere.com/r/docker
Features: - Remote push notification for events like print completion or filament change with end-to-end encryption - Remote push notifications for your print progress with end-to-end encryption - More coming in the future!
Learn more @ https://plugins.octoprint.org/plugins/octoapp/
Container.Category: Cloud: HomeAutomation: Productivity: Tools: Network:Management Status:Stable
